<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3098</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Monitoring butterflies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überwachung der Basisrecheneinheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Surveillance des papillons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Monitorando borboletas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Farfalle della Verifica e Controllo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πεταλούδες ελέγχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vigilar mariposas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This page has instructions and explanations for monitoring Butterflies along preset monitoring tracks in areas which they habitate and for identifying them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">research</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">butterflies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">data</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Seite hat Anweisungen und Erklärungen für
die Überwachung der Basisrecheneinheiten entlang stellen die 
Überwachung der Spuren in den Bereichen ein, die sie habitate und 
für das Kennzeichnen sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette page a des instructions et les explications
pour surveiller des papillons le long de pré-établissent surveiller 
des pistes dans les zones qui elles habitate et pour les identifier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta página tem instruções e as explanações 
para monitorar borboletas ao longo pré-ajustam a monitoração de 
trilhas nas áreas que elas habitate e para as identificar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa pagina ha istruzioni e le spiegazioni per 
il controllo delle farfalle lungo prestabiliscono il controllo delle 
piste nelle zone che habitate e per identificarle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σελίδα έχει τις οδηγίες και τις εξηγήσεις για 
τον έλεγχο προετοιμασμένη πεταλούδων εμπρός των διαδρομών 
ελέγχου στις περιοχές που αυτοί habitate και για τον 
προσδιορισμό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta paginación tiene instrucciones y las 
explicaciones para vigilar mariposas a lo largo preestablecen vigilar 
pistas en las áreas que ellas habitate y para identificarlas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Basisrecheneinheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">recherche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">papillons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">données</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pesquisa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">borboletas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ricerca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">farfalle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έρευνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
